# MTLLogContainer

**Structure**

A collection of logged messages, created when a Metal device runs a command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MTLLogContainer
```

## Overview

Enumerate a log container object to get a list of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLFunctionLog] instances.

## Shader logs

- **MTLFunctionLog**: A log entry a Metal device generates when the it runs a command buffer.

## Conforms To

- Sequence
